# braintrustdata_users (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust users with API-native searchable filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List users with no filters
data "braintrustdata_users" "all" {
  limit = 50
}

# Filter users by email
data "braintrustdata_users" "filtered_email" {
  email = "alice@example.com"
}

# Filter users by IDs using API-native ids query parameter
data "braintrustdata_users" "filtered_ids" {
  filter_ids = data.braintrustdata_users.all.ids
}

output "all_user_ids" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_users.all.ids
}

output "filtered_users" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_users.filtered_email.users
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `email` (String) Optional email filter.
- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch users before this ID.
- `family_name` (String) Optional family name filter.
- `filter_ids` (List of String) Optional list of user IDs to filter by. Maps to repeated `ids` query parameters.
- `given_name` (String) Optional given name filter.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of users to return.
- `org_name` (String) Optional organization name filter.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch users after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `ids` (List of String) List of returned user IDs.
- `users` (Attributes List) List of users. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users))

<a id="nestedatt--users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `users`

Read-Only:

- `avatar_url` (String) The URL of the user's avatar image.
- `created` (String) The timestamp when the user was created.
- `email` (String) The user's email.
- `family_name` (String) The user's family name.
- `given_name` (String) The user's given name.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the user.
